title: Getting 1000 ping constantly.
body:
There is tons of lag and people are saying im disconnecting as a troll, which im not. People are going to try report me for afk, but really my internet is fine, i have no idea what's going on. Please help, and I will post a video if you wish. \

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please run the tool on [this page](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/P74th11d-oce-network-diagnostics-tool) and let me know when you've completed all the steps? I can take a look at the logs you send in if you submit the email address associated with your LoL account on that page.
Let's see if we can find out what's going on!
